name: Punch, Shoot, Bang!
description:
Beat em back, shoot em up, and send em packing!

Punch, Shoot, Bang! is a first person shooter with a fiery twist: when enemies are killed, they explode! Strategically line up scores of enemies to rack up the biggest combo in this high-octane experience, but be careful, as the explosions can harm you as well!

Controls (Keyboard and mouse only):

  • Movement: WASD
  • Running: Left Shift - Stamina is limited, keep an eye on the yellow bar!
  • Shoot: Left Mouse Button
  • Reload: R - Attempting to fire an empty weapon will automatically reload
  • Switch Weapons: 1 & 2 or the scroll wheel
  • Punch: Right Mouse Button - Launches enemies in the air and briefly stuns them when they land; enemies will only explode if killed while airborne or stunned! (Or by other explosions, of course)

This game was created by Team Cheese Pizza (Brenden Hover on gameplay and Juan Adrian Vela on visual assets) for the Texas A&M Game Developers' semesterly game jam over the course of roughly seven weeks in Fall 2019. The jam's theme was "Chain Reaction."
